message: I left my laptop power adapter at home so i'm looking for ideas on how to get a hold of one.  Does anyone have an adapter for a lenovo that I can borrow or know of where I can buy one?  I would hate to go through pycon without a laptop.
I'm not coming down until Thurs afternoon, but I can bring a spare with me. I've got a couple.
You can borrow my Lenovo poweradapter a couple of times until thursday afternoon
@austingabel What model do you have ? I can bring one for a T510 which also works for T60

@austingabel I'm attending only the tutorials part of PyCon, but can lend you the adaptor. Return it/ship it when you are done. Drop we an email and I'll hand it to you tomm. or thursday - geek.1701d@gmail.com
Thanks for all the offers.  I have a T61 if that makes a difference
I've got an X61 I can bring the adapter for tomorrow, if it would work. How you would discern that I am unsure.
@holdenweb I don't think the X-series adapters put out enough power for the a T (my X200's supply is rated at 65W, while, IIRC, the T's are 85W)
If I can get an adapter from Koding for the tutorials I think I can manage without one for the rest of the conference.  If things change I'll post again.  Thanks everyone for the help
Also: you can use my T60 cable if you still need one.
